alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 2:51PM MST until August 21 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 250 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Saddlebrooke, or 13 miles west of Oracle, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cactus Forest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
